events.message: Customer submitted claim after a minor collision involving two vehicles at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident type as the report included terms such as vehicle and collision.
An agent was assigned promptly to handle the accident claim and assist the insured through the process.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed that investigation will begin shortly.
Request sent to customer for vehicle registration, police report, and damage photos to support the collision claim.
Customer provided all requested documents including police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and the repair estimate.
Investigation into the collision circumstances began, focusing on fault assessment and validation of documents.
Investigation completed with all facts verified and the claim found valid as submitted by the claimant.
Settlement proposal sent to the customer based on repair estimates and policy terms for the vehicle accident.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement offer and expressed appreciation for efficient claim handling.
The claim was formally approved and authorization provided for payment processing related to the auto accident.
Insurance payment was issued directly to the repair shop as per the agreed settlement for the vehicle damage.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed following final payment and confirmation with the customer.
All files related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
